## ğŸ§ª Testing

Describe the testing performed to ensure the quality and stability of your changes.
Provide clear steps for how reviewers can reproduce the issue (if applicable) and verify the fix/feature.

**To test this PR locally:**
1.  Clone this branch: `git clone -b <your-branch-name> https://github.com/chirag127/RapidStart-Express-NodeJS-WebApp-Template.git`
2.  Navigate to the project directory: `cd RapidStart-Express-NodeJS-WebApp-Template`
3.  Install dependencies: `npm install` (or `yarn install`)
4.  Start the application: `npm start` (or `yarn start`)
5.  Access the application at `http://localhost:3000` (or configured port).
6.  **Specific Test Steps:**

    *   [ ] Step 2: Test [another specific aspect].
